mapper.sql: ACCOUNT_NO, ACCOUNT_NAME, CUSTOMER_NO, OPEN_DATE, CLOSE_DATE, EXPIRED_DATE, PAY_PASSWD, INIT_PASSWD, INIT_PASSWD_MODIFIED, PASSWD_ERR_NUM, PASSWD_ERR_LOCK_TIME, STATUS, COMM_STATUS, TYPE, GRADE, IS_REALNAME, APANAGE, ORGANIZATION_CODE, AREA_CODE, CITY_CODE, OPEN_CHANNEL, BALANCE, LAST_DAY_BAL, LAST_MONTH_BAL, AVAILABLE_BALANCE, UNAVAILABLE_BALANCE, WITHDRAW_BALANCE, FROZEN_AMOUNT, PREAUTHORIZED_AMT, LAST_TXN_DATE, DAY_SUM_CONS_AMT, DAY_SUM_CONS_CNT, DAY_SUM_OUT_AMT, DAY_SUM_OUT_CNT, DAY_SUM_IN_AMT, DAY_SUM_IN_CNT, DAY_SUM_CASH_AMT, DAY_SUM_CASH_CNT, DAY_SUM_DEPOSIT_AMT, DAY_SUM_DEPOSIT_CNT, MONTH_SUM_CONS_AMT, MONTH_SUM_OUT_AMT, MONTH_SUM_IN_AMT, MONTH_SUM_CASH_AMT, MONTH_SUM_CHG_AMT, IS_ALLOWED_CLOSE, IS_CLOSE_RTN_CASH, ENCRYPTED_MSG, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, LAST_TXN_TIME, RSVD_AMT1, RSVD_AMT2, RSVD_TEXT1, RSVD_TEXT2, MONTH_SUM_CONS_CNT, MONTH_SUM_OUT_CNT, MONTH_SUM_IN_CNT, MONTH_SUM_CASH_CNT, MONTH_SUM_CHG_CNT, MASTER_ACCOUNT_NO, FORBIDDEN_TXN, EXTEND_COUNT, FORBIDDEN_CHANNEL

a.ACCOUNT_NO, a.ACCOUNT_NAME, a.CUSTOMER_NO, a.OPEN_DATE, a.CLOSE_DATE, a.EXPIRED_DATE, a.PAY_PASSWD, a.INIT_PASSWD, a.INIT_PASSWD_MODIFIED, a.PASSWD_ERR_NUM, a.PASSWD_ERR_LOCK_TIME, a.STATUS, a.COMM_STATUS, a.TYPE, a.GRADE, a.IS_REALNAME, a.APANAGE, a.ORGANIZATION_CODE, a.AREA_CODE, a.CITY_CODE, a.OPEN_CHANNEL, a.BALANCE, a.LAST_DAY_BAL, a.LAST_MONTH_BAL, a.AVAILABLE_BALANCE, a.UNAVAILABLE_BALANCE, a.WITHDRAW_BALANCE, a.FROZEN_AMOUNT, a.PREAUTHORIZED_AMT, a.LAST_TXN_DATE, a.DAY_SUM_CONS_AMT, a.DAY_SUM_CONS_CNT, a.DAY_SUM_OUT_AMT, a.DAY_SUM_OUT_CNT, a.DAY_SUM_IN_AMT, a.DAY_SUM_IN_CNT, a.DAY_SUM_CASH_AMT, a.DAY_SUM_CASH_CNT, a.DAY_SUM_DEPOSIT_AMT, a.DAY_SUM_DEPOSIT_CNT, a.MONTH_SUM_CONS_AMT, a.MONTH_SUM_OUT_AMT, a.MONTH_SUM_IN_AMT, a.MONTH_SUM_CASH_AMT, a.MONTH_SUM_CHG_AMT, a.IS_ALLOWED_CLOSE, a.IS_CLOSE_RTN_CASH, a.ENCRYPTED_MSG, a.LAST_UPDATE_TIME, a.LAST_TXN_TIME, a.RSVD_AMT1, a.RSVD_AMT2, a.RSVD_TEXT1, a.RSVD_TEXT2, a.MONTH_SUM_CONS_CNT, a.MONTH_SUM_OUT_CNT, a.MONTH_SUM_IN_CNT, a.MONTH_SUM_CASH_CNT, a.MONTH_SUM_CHG_CNT, a.MASTER_ACCOUNT_NO, a.FORBIDDEN_TXN, a.EXTEND_COUNT, a.FORBIDDEN_CHANNEL
mapper.select:
select
from CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNT where account_no= #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STATUS!='9'

select
from CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNT a where a.customer_no= #{customerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (a.type='1') and a.STATUS!='9'

select
from CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNT a where a.customer_no= #{customerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (a.type='1') and a.STATUS!='9'

select
from CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNT a where a.customer_no= #{customerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (a.type='2') and a.STATUS!='9'

select * from CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNT a join CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNT_CARD c on a.account_no=c.offline_account_no where (c.card_no= #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or substr(c.card_no,3,16)=#{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) and
(to_char(c.unbinding_time,'yyyyMMdd')>=#{acceptTransDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||#{acceptTransTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or c.unbinding_time is null) and to_char(c.binding_time,'yyyyMMdd')<=#{acceptTransDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||#{acceptTransTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNT a where ACCOUNT_NO = #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNT a where ACCOUNT_NO = #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.STATUS!='9'

select
,c.card_no,c.card_type,c.binding_mehod from CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNT a join CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNT_CARD c on a.account_no=c.fund_account_no where c.card_no= #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.BINDING_FLAG='1' and a.STATUS!='9'

select
,c.card_no,c.card_type,c.binding_mehod from CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNT a join CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNT_CARD c on a.account_no=c.fund_account_no where c.card_no= #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.BINDING_FLAG='1' and a.STATUS!='9'

select
from CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNT a join CORE.T_INFO_CUSTOMER c on a.customer_no=c.customer_no where c.unify_id= #{unifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (a.type='1') and a.STATUS!='9'

select
from CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNT a join CORE.T_INFO_CUSTOMER c on a.customer_no=c.customer_no where c.unify_id= #{unifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (a.type='1') and a.STATUS!='9'

select
from CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNT S where S.customer_no= (SELECT A.ENTERPRISE_CUSTOMERNO FROM CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNTENTERPRISE A, CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNTENTERPRISE_ORG B WHERE A.ENTERPRISE_CUSTOMERNO = B.ENTERPRISE_CUSTOMERNO AND B.ORG_CODE = #{orgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND S.TYPE='1' and S.STATUS!='9'

mapper.update:
update CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNT
ACCOUNT_NAME = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_NO = #{customerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPEN_DATE = #{openDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CLOSE_DATE = #{closeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXPIRED_DATE = #{expiredDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PAY_PASSWD = #{payPasswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INIT_PASSWD = #{initPasswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INIT_PASSWD_MODIFIED = #{initPasswdModified,jdbcType=CHAR},
PASSWD_ERR_NUM = #{passwdErrNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PASSWD_ERR_LOCK_TIME = #{passwdErrLockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
COMM_STATUS = #{commStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
GRADE = #{grade,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_REALNAME = #{isRealname,jdbcType=CHAR},
APANAGE = #{apanage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGANIZATION_CODE = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA_CODE = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPEN_CHANNEL = #{openChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BALANCE = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_DAY_BAL = #{lastDayBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_MONTH_BAL = #{lastMonthBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AVAILABLE_BALANCE = #{availableBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNAVAILABLE_BALANCE = #{unavailableBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WITHDRAW_BALANCE = #{withdrawBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FROZEN_AMOUNT = #{frozenAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PREAUTHORIZED_AMT = #{preauthorizedAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_TXN_DATE = #{lastTxnDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DAY_SUM_CONS_AMT = #{daySumConsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_SUM_CONS_CNT = #{daySumConsCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_SUM_OUT_AMT = #{daySumOutAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_SUM_OUT_CNT = #{daySumOutCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_SUM_IN_AMT = #{daySumInAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_SUM_IN_CNT = #{daySumInCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_SUM_CASH_AMT = #{daySumCashAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_SUM_CASH_CNT = #{daySumCashCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_SUM_DEPOSIT_AMT = #{daySumDepositAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_SUM_DEPOSIT_CNT = #{daySumDepositCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MONTH_SUM_CONS_AMT = #{monthSumConsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MONTH_SUM_OUT_AMT = #{monthSumOutAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MONTH_SUM_IN_AMT = #{monthSumInAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MONTH_SUM_CASH_AMT = #{monthSumCashAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MONTH_SUM_CHG_AMT = #{monthSumChgAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_ALLOWED_CLOSE = #{isAllowedClose,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_CLOSE_RTN_CASH = #{isCloseRtnCash,jdbcType=CHAR},
ENCRYPTED_MSG = #{encryptedMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_TXN_TIME = #{lastTxnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RSVD_AMT1 = #{rsvdAmt1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RSVD_AMT2 = #{rsvdAmt2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RSVD_TEXT1 = #{rsvdText1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSVD_TEXT2 = #{rsvdText2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MONTH_SUM_CONS_CNT = #{monthSumConsCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MONTH_SUM_OUT_CNT = #{monthSumOutCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MONTH_SUM_IN_CNT = #{monthSumInCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MONTH_SUM_CASH_CNT = #{monthSumCashCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MONTH_SUM_CHG_CNT = #{monthSumChgCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MASTER_ACCOUNT_NO = #{masterAccountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FORBIDDEN_TXN = #{forbiddenTxn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTEND_COUNT = #{extendCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FORBIDDEN_CHANNEL = #{forbiddenChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ACCOUNT_NO = #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNT
GRADE = #{grade,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_REALNAME = #{isRealname,jdbcType=CHAR},
AREA_CODE = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where CUSTOMER_NO = #{customerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNT
BALANCE = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_DAY_BAL = #{lastDayBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_MONTH_BAL = #{lastMonthBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AVAILABLE_BALANCE = #{availableBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNAVAILABLE_BALANCE = #{unavailableBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WITHDRAW_BALANCE = #{withdrawBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FROZEN_AMOUNT = #{frozenAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PREAUTHORIZED_AMT = #{preauthorizedAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_TXN_DATE = #{lastTxnDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DAY_SUM_CONS_AMT = #{daySumConsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_SUM_CONS_CNT = #{daySumConsCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_SUM_OUT_AMT = #{daySumOutAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_SUM_OUT_CNT = #{daySumOutCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_SUM_IN_AMT = #{daySumInAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_SUM_IN_CNT = #{daySumInCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_SUM_CASH_AMT = #{daySumCashAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_SUM_CASH_CNT = #{daySumCashCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_SUM_DEPOSIT_AMT = #{daySumDepositAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_SUM_DEPOSIT_CNT = #{daySumDepositCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MONTH_SUM_CONS_AMT = #{monthSumConsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MONTH_SUM_OUT_AMT = #{monthSumOutAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MONTH_SUM_IN_AMT = #{monthSumInAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MONTH_SUM_CASH_AMT = #{monthSumCashAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MONTH_SUM_CHG_AMT = #{monthSumChgAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_ALLOWED_CLOSE = #{isAllowedClose,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_CLOSE_RTN_CASH = #{isCloseRtnCash,jdbcType=CHAR},
ENCRYPTED_MSG = #{encryptedMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MONTH_SUM_CONS_CNT = #{monthSumConsCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MONTH_SUM_OUT_CNT = #{monthSumOutCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MONTH_SUM_IN_CNT = #{monthSumInCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MONTH_SUM_CASH_CNT = #{monthSumCashCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MONTH_SUM_CHG_CNT = #{monthSumChgCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PASSWD_ERR_NUM=0, PASSWD_ERR_LOCK_TIME=null
where ACCOUNT_NO = #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STATUS!='9'

IS_CLOSE_RTN_CASH = #{isCloseRtnCash,jdbcType=CHAR}, ENCRYPTED_MSG = #{encryptedMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_TXN_TIME = #{lastTxnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RSVD_AMT1 = #{rsvdAmt1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RSVD_AMT2 = #{rsvdAmt2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RSVD_TEXT1 = #{rsvdText1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RSVD_TEXT2 = #{rsvdText2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONTH_SUM_CONS_CNT = #{monthSumConsCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MONTH_SUM_OUT_CNT = #{monthSumOutCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MONTH_SUM_IN_CNT = #{monthSumInCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MONTH_SUM_CASH_CNT = #{monthSumCashCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MONTH_SUM_CHG_CNT = #{monthSumChgCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MASTER_ACCOUNT_NO = #{masterAccountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FORBIDDEN_TXN = #{forbiddenTxn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXTEND_COUNT = #{extendCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FORBIDDEN_CHANNEL = #{forbiddenChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ACCOUNT_NO = #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNT set BALANCE = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_DAY_BAL = #{lastDayBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_MONTH_BAL = #{lastMonthBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AVAILABLE_BALANCE = #{availableBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNAVAILABLE_BALANCE = #{unavailableBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WITHDRAW_BALANCE = #{withdrawBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FROZEN_AMOUNT = #{frozenAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PREAUTHORIZED_AMT = #{preauthorizedAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_TXN_DATE = #{lastTxnDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAY_SUM_CONS_AMT = #{daySumConsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DAY_SUM_CONS_CNT = #{daySumConsCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DAY_SUM_OUT_AMT = #{daySumOutAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DAY_SUM_OUT_CNT = #{daySumOutCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DAY_SUM_IN_AMT = #{daySumInAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DAY_SUM_IN_CNT = #{daySumInCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DAY_SUM_CASH_AMT = #{daySumCashAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DAY_SUM_CASH_CNT = #{daySumCashCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DAY_SUM_DEPOSIT_AMT = #{daySumDepositAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DAY_SUM_DEPOSIT_CNT = #{daySumDepositCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MONTH_SUM_CONS_AMT = #{monthSumConsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MONTH_SUM_OUT_AMT = #{monthSumOutAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MONTH_SUM_IN_AMT = #{monthSumInAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MONTH_SUM_CASH_AMT = #{monthSumCashAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MONTH_SUM_CHG_AMT = #{monthSumChgAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_ALLOWED_CLOSE = #{isAllowedClose,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_CLOSE_RTN_CASH = #{isCloseRtnCash,jdbcType=CHAR}, ENCRYPTED_MSG = #{encryptedMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_TXN_TIME = #{lastTxnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PASSWD_ERR_NUM=0, PASSWD_ERR_LOCK_TIME=null where ACCOUNT_NO=#{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNT set LAST_UPDATE_TIME =#{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PASSWD_ERR_NUM=0, PASSWD_ERR_LOCK_TIME=null where ACCOUNT_NO=#{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STATUS!='9'

update CORE.T_INFO_ACCOUNT set STATUS =#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDATE_TIME =#{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PASSWD_ERR_NUM=0, PASSWD_ERR_LOCK_TIME=null where ACCOUNT_NO=#{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
